Description: Death animations will occur more rarely, which will make you appreciate them more!

CheckboxSettings.Name: Use smart probabilities
CheckboxSettings.Description: With each passing night, it will be more and more probable you get a death animation.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Improbable Death Animations
CheckboxSettings.Description: Deactivate this to not have the game randomizing whether you see or not the death anim if you only want the random death anims.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Random Death Animations
CheckboxSettings.Description: Yeah, CL killed you but it appeared to be an arso, crazy.

TextInputSettings.Name: Probability of the Death Anims
TextInputSettings.Description: The percentage of you getting a death anim (Be it randomized or not).

TextInputSettings.Name: Probability added per night
TextInputSettings.Description: The percentage added per night to the initial percentage. Can be negative.
